name: Mudskipper
description:
This game was designed to work with a custom controller I built - a belt which measures the velocity of your breathing using an arduino to determine when you inhale. 

I still wanted to make this game available for others to try even without the belt, so simply press "b" every time you breathe in... no cheating :)

The game is about a little fish that can't breathe on land going through different stages of evolution, until it can finally breathe air! 

All art is my own, except for trees and bushes which are by Spika in the Unity Store. Credit for music goes to Mr. Noone for "Retro Blues".
